remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何 HTML 控件适配器都可以调用方法以添加属性。The method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add an attribute. 由于它是虚拟的，因此它也可以由继承此方法的适配器自定义。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method. 若要确定设备是否支持访问键属性，请使用 属性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `src` `soundstart` `loop` `volume` `vibration` `viblength` `` 如果设备支持属性，则方法会在和 `` 元素中写入、、、、和属性。The method writes the `src`, `soundstart`, `loop`, `volume`, `vibration`, and `viblength` attributes in `` and `` elements, if the device supports the attributes. 若要确定设备是否支持访问键属性，请使用 属性。To determine whether a device supports an access key attribute, use the property. 任何 HTML 控件适配器都可以调用此方法以添加属性。This method can be called by any HTML control adapter to add the attributes. 由于它是虚拟的，因此它也可以由继承此方法的适配器自定义。Because it is virtual, it also can be customized by adapters that inherit this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持称为 " *辅助 UI*" 的概念。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 辅助 UI 由需要显示 UI 的其他屏幕的控件使用，其方式与基于 Windows 的应用程序显示对话框的方式相同。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way that a Windows-based application shows dialog boxes. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅 [适配器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)) 文档。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see the [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)) documentation.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

Adapter Sets Functionality

if the adapter generates markup that requires <> tags for form submission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用此属性 来确定生成的标记中是否需要窗体标记。This property is used by the class to determine whether the form tag is needed in the resulting markup. 目前只能识别 cHTML 适配器上的设置。Currently, only the settings on cHTML adapters are recognized. 但是，可以使用此属性在适配器中提供自己的呈现。However, you can use this property to provide your own rendering in your adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 和 WML 适配器集支持称为 " *辅助 UI*" 的概念。The HTML and WML adapter sets support a concept called *secondary UI*. 辅助 UI 由需要显示 UI 的其他屏幕的控件使用，其方式与基于 Windows 的应用程序中的对话框相同。Secondary UI is used by controls that need to show additional screens of UI, in the same way as a dialog box in a Windows-based application. 有关辅助用户界面的详细信息，请参阅 [适配器集功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100))。For more information about secondary user interfaces, see [Adapter Sets Functionality](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/htxac286(v=vs.100)).
